name: Package Stower VR
description:
**  (VR headset required, developed on a Samsung Odyssey+ for WMR via Win10 Pro x64) **

Developed in 4 days by Lubek Enterprises for the 2021 Epic Games Mega Jam

https://sites.google.com/view/legaming/home

___________________________________________________________________________

Description:

Packages are coming down the conveyor belt and you need to put them into the correct storage containers. One comes every 3.5 seconds. Place a package in the correct bin, a green light flashes, and you're closer to filling it up (blue light). Once a container is full, no more packages will be spawned for that destination. And once you've filled 18 of 30 containers, you've beat the level. Storing a package in the wrong location will yield a red light and a score penalty. If not removed, it will make your job much more difficult. Careful though because correct packages falling out of a full container will mark it as unfull, and constant collisions means you'll have to put more into that container. Try to get as high of a score as you can!

Oh yeah... and every package you miss gets vaporized and counts against your score.

___________________________________________________________________________

Calculations:

Score is calculated via this equation:

((Stow Rate - Incorrect Attempts) - (3 * Packages Destroyed)) / 2

WHERE

Stow Rate = (Packages Correctly Stowed / Seconds) * 3600   --- Since this is an hourly rate I get pkgs/second and multiply by 3600secs/1hr to get pkgs/hr

___________________________________________________________________________

Controls:

Right Grip - Grab Right

Right Thumbstick - Teleport

Left Grip - Grab Left

Left Thumbstick - Rotate

Right Trigger - Shoot (Easter Egg)

**NOTE**: For some stupid reason Oculus controllers are always shown instead of WMR controllers.
